EditTextPreference.android:title: Time to seek
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Time to seek in second. 60 means 60 seconds

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Use Random by Duration
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: If enabled, app will randomize time by duration. Otherwise, randomizing will be done by percentage

EditTextPreference.android:title: Duration Format
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Use dash as interval. 30-60 means random time will be greater than 30 and less than 60 seconds

EditTextPreference.android:title: Percent Format
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Use dash as interval. 10-20 means random time will be greater than 10% and less than 20% relative by duration of current song
